content: I am currently an undergraduate student in National Tsing Hua University, and major in Electrical Engineering department. I am interested in Reinforcement Learning and Bioinformatics. Recently, I join the project working on drug disocvery with machine learning, supervised by Prof. Min Sun.

title: Wei-Cheng Tseng

summary: Our method leverages unsupervised sequenceembedding and the success of deep convolutional neural network to predict the functions of protein sequences.
title: Leveraging Sequence Embedding and ConvolutionalNeural Network for Protein Function Prediction
